channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins PAM Authentication Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins PAM Authentication Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10319|2024-08-04T22:17:20.399Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pam%20authentication%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins PAM Authentication Plugin 1.5 and earlier, except 1.4.1 in PamSecurityRealm.DescriptorImpl#doTest allowed users with Overall/Read permission to obtain limited information about the file /etc/shadow and the user Jenkins is running as.
